===================================================================

+++ 
@@ -119,8 +119,6 @@
         'gradient-gaming': 'linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%)',
       },
     },
   },
-  plugins: [
-    require('@tailwindcss/forms'),
-  ],
+  plugins: [],
 } 
\ No newline at end of file

-        slideDown: {

-        scaleIn: {
